If you donâ€™t know what this is, you should start from the beginning. This is it. The last puzzle. posts.text: ç®€ä»‹ Building and deploying new applications is faster with containers.Docker containers wrap up software and its dependencies into a standardized unit for software development that includes everything it needs to run: code, runtime, system tools and libraries. This guarantees that your application will always run the same and makes collaboration as simple as sharing a container image.
